nodes.text: The Anaxes canyon was a canyon located on the planet Anaxes. During the Battle of Anaxes, a Republic gunship was shot down by Separatist DSD1 dwarf spider droids and crashed in the canyon. Clone Commander CC-2224 was injured in the crash, but Clone Force 99 combated the Separatist forces using Plan 82 and allowed the Republic forces to continue with their mission to infiltrate the Cyber Center.
